text: Neusorg is a municipality in Tirschenreuth in Bavaria, Germany. The town itself is the seat of Neusorg municipal federation. ==Geography== Neusorg has nine districts: Neusorg, Riglasreuth, Schwarzenreuth, Stockau, Stöcken, Wäsch, Weihermühle, and Wernersreuth. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Tirschenreuth (district)
title: Neusorg
